inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patients or their legally authorized representative must have signed and dated an informed consent form

inclusion.criterion: adequate samples of breast tissue available
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: ductal carcinoma in situ or ductal carcinoma in situ with microinvasion
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: A core biopsy revealed a 3 cm invasive ductal breast carcinoma...

inclusion.criterion: atypical ductal hyperplasia, lobular cancer in situ or any preinvasive breast lesion
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: ductal carcinoma in situ undergoing lumpectomy and radiation or mastectomy
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patients with ductal carcinoma in situ undergoing either lumpectomy and radiation or mastectomy.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The tumor is  HER2-positive and ER/PR negative. Axillary sampling revealed 5 positive lymph nodes.

exclusion.criterion: patient desires not to participate in the study
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a candidate for tumor resection and agrees to do so prior to chemotherapy.
